dating.author: dover_soul
dating.post: Mr. Jones should put a message at the top of each of his four posts to indicate that the hypothesis has been proven wrong. We certainly don’t want some journalist saying that pro-authenticity folk think that … you get the idea. There are lessons in this for all us. Do more research. Ask for opinions from each other. Avoid conspiracy theory. Having said that I applaud Mr. Jones for intellectual imagination and creativity in trying to find solutions.
dating.title: Comment Promoted:  On the Hacking Hypothesis
